name: Threshold Version 0.01
description:
This is a incomplete version of my Yume Nikki Fangame: Threshold! 

I started development in 2018 in RPG Maker MV. That attempt was not successful to say the least. I dropped the project and went on to other things. Fast foreword to now. I have had time to practice pixel art. I switched development to RPG Maker 2003, and things have been much smoother. 

Most of the music is done by The Lovely Abyss. (https://lovelyabyss.bandcamp.com/) All sprite work done by me, StudyMan99. (it looks pretty bad right now but I'll fix it in post)  ((tho there is a RTP song in one of the worlds))

WARNING: 

This game has blood and gore and unfinished animations 

Version 0.01 : this version has a bunch of bug fixes. There is a change log if you are curious. 

Currently:

-5 Effects are currently in the game (19 are planned) ((or more idk))

-6 Nexus doors  

-3 ending are planned: Bad end, Very Bad end, and the worst end ever.

If you find any bugs, please comment below. I will try to figure out how to fix it. 

(๑•́ ₃ •̀๑)

I hope whoever plays this game enjoys it OWO!!! I appreciate you for reading this, yes, you. Hello there. 

Thank You,

~StudyMan99~

❤⃛ヾ(๑❛ ▿ ◠๑ )
